title: Support & Services
description: Brokerage support, assistance with offers, and expert guidance

faqs.question: Does the Brokerage offer assistance to agents, especially when making or negotiating offers?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely! As a Toronto Real Estate Realty Plus agent, you receive full brokerage support. We will help you review and ensure the accuracy of your offers, and our Broker of Record is available to assist with negotiating offers as needed. You're never alone in the processâ€”we provide expert guidance every step of the way.
